docs.title: Install Python Requirements
docs.text:
This project uses pipenv. Install dependencies with:

pipenv install

Activate the virtual environment:

pipenv shell

Or run a single command in the virtual environment, e.g.:

pipenv run python manage.py runserver

docs.title: Create and Migrate Database
docs.text:
Create a new database for your project:

pipenv shell
python manage.py migrate

This will create the necessary tables in your database.

docs.title: Create Admin Account
docs.text:
Create a new admin account:

pipenv run python manage.py createsuperuser

Follow the prompts to set up your admin account.

docs.title: Load Data from Fixtures
docs.text:
Load sample data from fixtures:

pipenv run python manage.py loaddata fixtures/*.json

docs.title: Run Huey consumer for async/periodic tasks
Access Swagger UI
docs.text: Access the Swagger UI to explore the API: http://localhost:8000/docs/swagger-ui/

docs.title: Access Django Admin UI
docs.text: Access the Django admin UI to manage your data: http://localhost:8000/admin/
